string.text: Black road mode

%c[0,150,150,150]Who am I? Where I am?
 
In this mode, you will appear in a random unsafe place, at night and without equipment.
 
This option is well complemented by the modes Ironman mode, Survival mode or Story mode.
 
 
%c[200,200,50,50]• %c[0,150,150,150]Not compatible with Warfare mode. 
 
%c[200,200,50,50]• %c[0,150,150,150]Not compatible with Azazel mode.
Treasure hunt mode

%c[0,150,150,150] 
In this mode, equipment and items in "unmarked" caches will be absent, as in Shadow of Chernobyl, but the contents of the "marked" caches will become richer.
 
%c[d_orange]• %c[0,150,150,150]Makes the gameplay much more difficult in the early game!
Wheel of Fortune mode

%c[0,150,150,150]In this mode, you give your fate to chance, the goddess of luck - The Fortuna. From time to time, it will bring you happiness and wealth, or conversely, pain and suffering.
 
%c[d_green]• %c[0,150,150,150]Compatible with any game mode!
Interval

%c[0,150,150,150]A mandatory feature for the Wheel of Fortune mode, which sets the time interval after which Fortune will, each time, determine your fate. \n%c[200,200,50,50]• %c[0,150,150,150]The Wheel of Fortune game mode must be enabled.
True STALKER
Through fire, water and brass pipes...
YOU ARE A DEVIL OF HELL!!! You in this world who could defy death and stop at nothing, even your fate is inclined to your feet, just to remain the alive! Congratulations!
You have unlocked the "True STALKER" achievement.

Belial

This artifact is straight out of hell!!! You are the first to whom the Devil himself decided to give immortality! Now nothing will stop you and no one can compare with you in strength. The artifact permeates your entire soul with a weak voice, and this voice repeats only one word and the word is... 
 
BELIAL...
